channel.title: mikkeli.hacklab.fi
channel.description: Avoin ja yhteisöllinen työtila tieteestä, teknologiasta ja digitaalisesta taiteesta kiinnostuneille Mikkelissä • An open and community-based workspace for people with interest in science, technology and digital arts in Mikkeli

item.title: New spectrum analyzer and vector network analyzer
item.author: Hacklab Mikkeli
item.description: Hacklab Mikkeli has bought new RF equipment: Rohde & Schwarz FSB 100Hz — 5GHz spectrum analyzer, and HP 8711B vector network analyzer. They can be used to measure, for example, frequency, amplitude, spectrum, S/N ratio, THD, antenna SWR, amplitude response and phase response in a wide frequency range. The spectrum analyzer can additionally be used as a radio tuner! Both devices are available to subscribers, and require training to operate.
